title: Introduction to C Programming
details: Learn the fundamentals of C programming, including variables, data types, control structures, and functions.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Discover the principles of algorithm design, analysis, and complexity. Master key algorithms and problem-solving techniques.

title: Introduction to C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms
details: Build a strong foundation in C++ programming and apply it to data structures and algorithm implementations.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Learn essential data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, and their applications.

title: Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming in Python
details: Explore object-oriented programming concepts using Python and build robust applications.

title: Software Engineering
details: Learn software development methodologies, project management, and best practices in software engineering.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing and Database (MySQL)
details: Get hands-on experience with AWS cloud services and MySQL database management in the cloud.

title: Problem Solving
details: Develop problem-solving skills, algorithmic thinking, and coding abilities through challenging exercises.
